repos_data.description: A library that allows you to easily mock out tests based on AWS infrastructure.

Saves up to 90% of AWS EC2 costs by automating the use of spot instances on existing AutoScaling groups. Installs in minutes using CloudFormation or Terraform. Convenient to deploy at scale using StackSets. Uses tagging to avoid launch configuration changes. Automated spot termination handling. Reliable fallback to on-demand instances.
ECS Reference Architecture for creating a flexible and scalable deployment pipeline to Amazon ECS using AWS CodePipeline
AWS operations by cli should be simpler
Bastillion for EC2 provides a browser-based SSH management platform designed specifically for AWS environments.
A community AWS SDK for Perl Programmers
zsh plugin to list up EC2 instances and ssh login the instances.
